resources.string: Select the types of CrossWords data or settings you want to save.
Replace which types of app data in CrossWords with data from the file “%1$s”?
Colors on the game board, e.g. of player names and bonus squares
All App settings except colors, e.g. default language and thumbnail size
All games and other data to identify your device.
The file “%1$s” does not contain CrossWords backup data.

Are you sure you want to overwrite CrossWords’s current games or settings with those from the file “%1$s”?\n\nPlease note that if you are importing networked games from a file created on another device (migrating, that is), you should not continue to use CrossWords on the old device.
